properties.areaDesc: Bureau, IL; La Salle, IL; Putnam, IL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 10:54AM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a Flood Warning
for the following rivers in Illinois...

Illinois River at Morris affecting Grundy County
Illinois River at Ottawa affecting La Salle County
Illinois River at La Salle affecting Bureau...La Salle and Putnam
Counties

The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation as well
as forecast precipitation 24-48 hours into the future.

The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Illinois River at La Salle, or from Starved Rock Lock and Dam
downstream to confluence with Big Bureau Creek.
* from late Saturday night until further notice.
* At  945 AM Friday the stage was 14.5 feet.
* Flood stage is 20.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by early Sunday morning and
continue to rise to near 26.5 feet by Monday evening.
properties.instruction:
Safety message...If you encounter a flooded roadway...turn around and
find an alternate route.

Additional information can be found at weather.gov/chicago.
